```{python}
import numpy as np
from sklearn.datasets import make_classification
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
from mysuperlearner.meta_learners import NNLogLikEstimator
from mysuperlearner.extended_super_learner import ExtendedSuperLearner

X, y = make_classification(n_samples=500, n_features=10, random_state=123)
learners = [
    ('rf', RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=50, random_state=1)),
    ('log', LogisticRegression(max_iter=200))
]

sl = ExtendedSuperLearner(method='nnloglik', folds=5, random_state=1)
sl.add(learners)
sl.add_meta()
sl.fit(X, y)
print('Done')
```
